categories: Category:Star Destroyers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: The Cataclysm was an Onager-class Star Destroyer in service to the Imperial Navy during the Imperial Era. At one point, the Star Destroyer was stationed near two gravity wells, and was approached by a Lambda-class T-4a shuttle flanked by a pair of TIE fighters. The Cataclysm was equipped with engines, a pair of superweapons at its bow, and two deflector shield generator domes.
The Cataclysm was first mentioned in the 2020 Onager-class Star Destroyer Expansion Pack, an expansion for the miniatures game Star Wars: Armada by Fantasy Flight Games, on a card of the same name.
